languages.text: "Так и есть. Кодексы Лекс Империалис — моя молитва, и я верю, что служение каждого арбитра священно, поскольку приближает несовершенную реальность к тому, что высечено в Книге суда. К воле Бога-Императора".

"As it should. The codes of the Lex Imperialis are my prayer, and I believe that every Arbitrator's service is sacred, for it brings this imperfect reality closer to that inscribed in the Book of Judgement — closer to the God-Emperor's will."
languages.original_text: "Так и есть. Кодексы Лекс Империалис — моя молитва, и я верю, что служение каждого арбитра священно, поскольку приближает несовершенную реальность к тому, что высечено в Книге суда. К воле Бога-Императора".

traits.locale_text: "As it should. The codes of the Lex Imperialis are my prayer, and I believe that every Arbitrator's service is sacred, for it brings the imperfect reality closer to what is inscribed in the Book of Judgement. To the God-Emperor's will."

"As it should. The codes of the Lex Imperialis are my prayer, and I believe that every Arbitrator's service is sacred, for it brings the imperfect reality closer to what is inscribed in the Book of Judgement. To the God-Emperor's will."

"As it should. The codes of the Lex Imperialis are my prayer, and I believe that every Arbitrator's service is sacred, for it brings this imperfect reality closer to that inscribed in the Book of Judgement — closer to the God-Emperor's will."

languages.text: 「当然です。レックス・インペリアの条文こそが、私にとっての祈りです。すべてのアービトレイターの奉仕は神聖なものだと私は信じています。なぜならそれは、この不完全な現実を『審判の書』に記された理想へと、すなわち、神帝陛下の御意志に一歩でも近づける行いだからです」
languages.original_text: "As it should. The codes of the Lex Imperialis are my prayer, and I believe that every Arbitrator's service is sacred, for it brings this imperfect reality closer to that inscribed in the Book of Judgement — closer to the God-Emperor's will."

traits.locale_text: 「当然です。レックス・インペリアの条文こそが、私にとっての祈りです。すべてのアービトレイターの奉仕は神聖なものだと私は信じています。なぜならそれは、この不完全な現実を『審判の書』に記された理想へと、すなわち、神帝陛下の御意志に一歩でも近づける行いだからです」

languages.text: "Das soll sie auch. Die Sätze des Lex Imperia sind mein Gebet, und ich glaube, dass die Dienste jedes Arbitrators heilig sind, denn sie bringen die unvollkommene Realität näher zu jener, die im Buch des Urteils beschrieben ist – näher zum Willen des Gottimperators."
languages.original_text: "As it should. The codes of the Lex Imperialis are my prayer, and I believe that every Arbitrator's service is sacred, for it brings this imperfect reality closer to that inscribed in the Book of Judgement — closer to the God-Emperor's will."

traits.locale_text: "Das soll sie auch. Die Sätze des Lex Imperia sind mein Gebet, und ich glaube, dass die Dienste jedes Arbitrators heilig sind, denn sie bringen die unvollkommene Realität näher zu jener, die im Buch des Urteils beschrieben ist – näher zum Willen des Gottimperators."

languages.text: « Comme de juste. Les codes de la Lex Imperialis sont mes prières. Pour moi, le devoir de chaque arbitrator est sacré, car il permet de façonner la réalité imparfaite afin de la rapprocher de ce qui est écrit dans le Livre du Jugement, et donc de la volonté de l'Empereur-Dieu. »
languages.original_text: "As it should. The codes of the Lex Imperialis are my prayer, and I believe that every Arbitrator's service is sacred, for it brings this imperfect reality closer to that inscribed in the Book of Judgement — closer to the God-Emperor's will."

traits.locale_text: « Comme de juste. Les codes de la Lex Imperialis sont mes prières. Pour moi, le devoir de chaque arbitrator est sacré, car il permet de façonner la réalité imparfaite afin de la rapprocher de ce qui est écrit dans le Livre du Jugement, et donc de la volonté de l'Empereur-Dieu. »

languages.text: «Y así ha de ser. Los dictados de la Lex Imperialis son mis oraciones, y creo firmemente que el servicio de todo Arbitrator es una labor sagrada, pues acerca esta realidad imperfecta a la que se plasma en el Libro del Juicio, más próxima a la voluntad del Dios Emperador».
languages.original_text: "As it should. The codes of the Lex Imperialis are my prayer, and I believe that every Arbitrator's service is sacred, for it brings this imperfect reality closer to that inscribed in the Book of Judgement — closer to the God-Emperor's will."

traits.locale_text: «Y así ha de ser. Los dictados de la Lex Imperialis son mis oraciones, y creo firmemente que el servicio de todo Arbitrator es una labor sagrada, pues acerca esta realidad imperfecta a la que se plasma en el Libro del Juicio, más próxima a la voluntad del Dios Emperador».

languages.text: “理应如此，帝国法典的内容便是我的祷词。我相信，每位法务官的侍奉都是神圣的，因为正如《审判之书》中所记载的那样——我们要让这个充满瑕疵的世界更加贴近神皇的意志。”
languages.original_text: "As it should. The codes of the Lex Imperialis are my prayer, and I believe that every Arbitrator's service is sacred, for it brings this imperfect reality closer to that inscribed in the Book of Judgement — closer to the God-Emperor's will."

traits.locale_text: “理应如此，帝国法典的内容便是我的祷词。我相信，每位法务官的侍奉都是神圣的，因为正如《审判之书》中所记载的那样——我们要让这个充满瑕疵的世界更加贴近神皇的意志。”

languages.text: "Olması gerektiği gibi. Lex İmperialis'in kanunları benim dualarımdır ve benim gözümde her Yargıcı'nın hizmeti kutsaldır. Zira bu hizmet; tanık olduğumuz kusurlu gerçekliği Hüküm Kitabı'nda yazılı olana, yani Tanrı İmparator'un iradesine yaklaştırır."
languages.original_text: "As it should. The codes of the Lex Imperialis are my prayer, and I believe that every Arbitrator's service is sacred, for it brings this imperfect reality closer to that inscribed in the Book of Judgement — closer to the God-Emperor's will."
